email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Temporary Account Suspension Notification

Dear Valued Bank of America Customer,

We are writing to inform you that we have detected some unusual activity on your Bank of America account. For your security and protection, we have temporarily suspended your account until further verification is completed.

In order to restore access to your account, we kindly ask you to click on the link below and follow the instructions to verify your identity:

[Phishing Link]

Please be aware that failure to verify your account within the next 24 hours will result in a permanent suspension of your account and potential loss of funds.

We take the security of your account very seriously and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Bank of America Security Team
